attributes.action: All school children should wear face masks to protect teachers and staff.
attributes.additional_details: I believe that the risk is too great especially with the new variant of covid.
attributes.background: Ensure that all school children wear masks at all times when in school except when eating or drinking.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Make wearing face masks mandatory in secondary schools and colleges: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/330227

Make masks mandatory for primary school students and teachers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551102
